templates.title: Brainstorming Session
templates.description: Facilitate a creative brainstorming session to generate innovative ideas and solutions

defaults.goal: Generate innovative ideas and solutions through collaborative brainstorming
defaults.critical: Encourage creative thinking and ensure all participants feel comfortable sharing their ideas
defaults.context: This is a brainstorming session where all ideas are welcome. There are no bad ideas during brainstorming.

templates.title: Feedback Collection
templates.description: Gather structured feedback on projects, proposals, or initiatives

defaults.goal: Collect comprehensive feedback from stakeholders in a structured manner
defaults.critical: Ensure feedback is specific, actionable, and balanced between positive aspects and areas for improvement
defaults.context: We're collecting feedback to improve our project/initiative. Both positive feedback and constructive criticism are valuable.
defaults.contextDescription: Please provide context about the project or initiative being reviewed

templates.title: Decision Making
templates.description: Guide groups through structured decision-making processes

defaults.goal: Reach a well-reasoned group decision through structured discussion
defaults.critical: Ensure all perspectives are considered and the decision-making process is transparent
defaults.context: We need to make a decision as a group. We'll evaluate options and their implications before reaching a conclusion.
defaults.contextDescription: Please provide context about the decision to be made
